requests.name: Potion of Learning
requests.description: Your very first potion, made with the help of your mentor. It enhances learning and memory.

requests.name: Elixir of Vitality
requests.description: A potion that boosts vitality and energy, using the Potion of Learning as a base.

requests.name: Resilience Brew
requests.description: A powerful potion that enhances physical resilience, building on the Elixir of Vitality.

requests.name: Clarity Draught
requests.description: A potion that clears the mind, using Resilience Brew as a key ingredient.

requests.name: Harmony Tonic
requests.description: Restores emotional balance and calms nerves, blending Clarity Draught and Potion of Learning.

requests.name: Fortune Elixir
requests.description: Brings good luck and fortune, using Harmony Tonic and Elixir of Vitality.

requests.name: Wisdom Serum
requests.description: Unlocks ancient knowledge, combining Fortune Elixir and Resilience Brew.

requests.name: Starlight Infusion
requests.description: A magical potion that illuminates the darkest paths, using Wisdom Serum and Harmony Tonic.
